      • getMask

        public java.lang.Integer[] getMask(org.jsfml.graphics.Texture texture)
        Gets the bitmask mapped to the given texture, if none are found a new mask is made
        Parameters:
        texture - texture to get the bitmask for
        Returns:
        bitmask associated with the texture

      • createMask

        public java.lang.Integer[] createMask(org.jsfml.graphics.Texture texture,
                                      org.jsfml.graphics.Image image)
        Creates a bitmask for a given texture by making an array to store the alpha of each pixel in a texture
        Parameters:
        texture - texture to map to the new bitmask
        image - image to make the bitmask of
        Returns:
        bitmask for the given image
